turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to try the eggnog latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, a tall eggnog latte. can you repeat what kind of milk you would like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. from which Starbucks store would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one that's closest to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, so just to confirm. a tall eggnog latte with whole milk, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your coffee will be ready to be picked up in 15 minutes.
